…servicemembers to leave the military. This amendment isn't only  bigoted; it is shortsighted and would hurt our national security. I  urge my colleagues to oppose this amendment.

Ms. Moore of Wisconsin moves to recommit the bill H.R. 6945       to the Committee on Ways and Means with instructions to       report the same back to the House forthwith…

…to support this important amendment today. I  hope my colleagues will join me in voting for this motion to recommit.

…support the needs of all of our veterans.

Mr. Chair, I urge my colleagues to join me in voting for the motion  to recommit, and I include in the Record the text of my amendment.

Ms. Kaptur moves to recommit the bill H.R. 3944 to the       Committee on Appropriations with the following amendment:

At the appropriate place, insert the following:…

…Energy's canceled awards and prohibit the department from  canceling future awards based on their so-called priorities.

Mr. Chair, I include in the Record the text of my amendment.

Ms. DeLAURO. Mr. Chair, I claim the time in opposition to the  amendment.

Ms. DeLAURO. Mr. Chair, I yield myself 2\1/2\ minutes.

Mr. Chair, before I get into the specifics of this amendment, I will  start with, hopefully, common ground.

…on to be on the front lines,  defending this Nation every day.

Our servicemembers put everything on the line, and we should do the  same for them. Vote ``no'' on this amendment.

Ms. TOKUDA. Mr. Chair, I claim the time in opposition.

Ms. TOKUDA. Mr. Chair, I rise in strong opposition to this amendment  striking funding for the Taiwan Security Cooperation…

…Ukraine Security Assistance Initiative.

My amendment would reinstate funding for the Ukraine Security  Assistance Initiative. I include in the Record the text of this  amendment.

Ms. Kaptur moves to recommit the bill H.R. 4016 to the       Committee on Appropriations with the following amendment:

At the appropriate place, insert the following:

Sec.…

…reality or captured  by ideology.

Mr. Speaker, I urge my colleagues to stand with the truth, stand with  women, and stand with our military, and vote in favor of this  amendment.

…help both our servicemembers, our air  arsenal, and our overall national security posture.

Mr. Chair, I thank the judge for his leadership, and I urge adoption  of this amendment.

Ms. WASSERMAN SCHULTZ. Mr. Chairman, I rise in opposition to the  amendment.
